thread.title: Kim Leethal
thread.title_full: Skipper (formerly Jetaport) reviewed by Kim Leethal

author: Kim Leethal
title: Kim Leethal
text: Skipper made setting up a hotel room block for my wedding so easy! I didn't have to spend hours on the phone with different hotels negotiating. I would highly recommend it! Devin was very helpful in answering all of my questions. Thanks for the excellent service!
